description: Verifies that a user with valid username and password can successfully log into the system.

story: Failed login due to incorrect password
description: Ensures that login fails when a valid username is provided with an incorrect password.
Checks that the system prevents login when the username field is left empty.
Verifies that login is rejected when the password field is left empty.

story: Login attempt with password containing whitespace
description: Tests that passwords containing whitespace characters are handled properly and result in login failure.

story: Login attempt with special characters in username
description: Validates that usernames containing potentially malicious characters like scripts are rejected.

story: Login attempt for a locked user account
description: Ensures that users whose accounts are locked cannot log in, even with correct credentials.
